text: Tando Adam Junction railway station (,) is located in Tando Adam city, Sanghar district of Sindh, Pakistan. ==Services== The following trains stop at Tando Adam Junction station: ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Sanghar District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Tando Adam Junction railway station
